# Torture Chamber (Room)
## Overview
**Torture Chamber**

**Benefit** bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks 

**Create** 7 Goods, 3 Influence, 5 Labor (330 gp); **Time** 20 days 

**Size** 6â€“16 squares 

This grim room is used for interrogation as well as torture and other morally questionable acts. It contains structures to bind humanoids and various implements designed to inflict pain and discomfort. Interrogators in this room gain a +3 bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks to influence captives.
